function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Community-based organizations and energy policies may involve physical gatherings and interactions, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The creation of energy communities and collective energy projects may lead to increased physical interaction and social gatherings, posing a risk for disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of privacy protection for individuals’ purchasing and movement data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through crowded retail spaces and transport hubs","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of economic instability and disparity in neighborhoods due to post-pandemic contractions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient investment capacity for digital visibility","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Liquidity crisis due to pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of skills and tools for local market analysis","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The emerging growth of mobile commerce and e-commerce may lead to an increase in physical interaction and foot traffic in retail spaces, leading to a higher risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The use of new customer-adapted delivery and collection services may involve direct interaction between delivery personnel and consumers, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The presence of various modalities of interaction with consumers, including in-person engagement methods, increases the risk of disease transmission in retail and neighborhood services.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity economy-based urban agenda may lead to increased proximity and contact between individuals, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity between organizations facilitating the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geographical proximity between companies in the same supply chain favoring the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaunch of territories’ economies depending on the indirect effects of the knowledge economy from a proximity perspective.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity trade involving retail sale of products within a contained area could facilitate the spread of contagious diseases due to the close proximity of customers and employees.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased population density in urban areas due to neighborhood development","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to essential services within a short distance","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on local businesses and trade for essential services","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of contagious diseases propagation in the built environment due to urban policies and proximity perspectives","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of pandemic on real estate sector in turkey","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Effects of social distancing on tourism, retail, and manufacturing sectors","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited support measures for entrepreneurs with leased properties","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High risk of economic loss due to prolonged closure of retail risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global recession impacting growth prospects","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruptions in industrial manufacturing and drop in risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of the infection in extensively urbanized areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of unreliable information during
